name: Poison Tail
description: Poisonous barbs sprout from your tail as you swing it at a creature. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing 1d8 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. If the natural attack roll is a 19 or 20, the move scores a critical hit and the target is poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d6 at level 5, 4d4 at level 10, and 3d10 at level 17.
